body:
You can write a letter to the other parent if they’re stopping you seeing your children.
 
In the letter you should ask for regular contact, suggesting possible days or times. If they refuse, ask whether they would consider [mediation]({app:urls:route:professional_mediation}) to resolve the issue.
 
Don’t forget to send your letter by recorded delivery so you know the other parent has received it.
heading: If you’re being prevented from seeing your children
